page.title: 13The Bowling Club.
page.content: The Club is a hive of activity in the Bowling season from the end of April to the end of September. There are{150 {men and 90 lady playing members}as well as many social members. The Club is run by all the members, (who are mostly retired), working together on a rota basis. The smart and spotlessly clean Clubhouse was built mainly with money left to the Club when a member died, but some money from the Council was needed. As the ground is such a sun-trap, it gets very warm by the Greens and so the matches attract spectators by the dozen. The most famous people who have played at the Club are{County players and{Middleton Cup players.}The Middleton Cup is the most prestigious inter-county competition.
